results.title: Immortal Sergeant cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.
results.description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Immortal Sergeant’ featuring Henry Fonda and Maureen O’Hara by Twentieth Century Fox Picture. Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

Pieces of black tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Billy the Kid cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Billy the Kid’ featuring Robert Taylor distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Pieces of cream tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

results.title: The Ghost Breakers cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This black and white slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Ghost Breakers’ featuring Bob Hope and Paulette Goddard distributed by Paramount Pictures. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to all edges of the image. “THU FRI SAT” has been scratched in to the lower edge of the glass.
results.description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This black and white slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Ghost Breakers’ featuring Bob Hope and Paulette Goddard distributed by Paramount Pictures. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to all edges of the image. “THU FRI SAT” has been scratched in to the lower edge of the glass.
description_for_label: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This black and white slide is an advertisement for the film ‘The Ghost Breakers’ featuring Bob Hope and Paulette Goddard distributed by Paramount Pictures. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to all edges of the image. “THU FRI SAT” has been scratched in to the lower edge of the glass.

results.title: Slightly Dangerous cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Slightly Dangerous’ featuring Lana Turner and Robert Young distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Several pieces of light brown tape adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Flying Tigers cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for ‘Flying Tigers’ (a.k.a. ‘Yank Over Singapore’ and ‘Yanks Over the Burma Road’) featuring John Wayne Carroll distributed by Republic Pictures. Four pieces of black tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Alrfred Hithcock's Lifeboat cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for Alfred Hitchcock’s production of ‘Lifeboat’ featuring Tallulah Bankhead distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Four pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top and bottom edges to cover cinema session details.

results.title: Four Jills in a Jeep cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Four Jills in a Jeep’ featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.
results.description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Four Jills in a Jeep’ featuring Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair distributed by 20th Century Fox Pictures. Three pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details. Kay Francis, Carole Landis, Martha Raye, and Mitzi Mayfair as themselves, re-enacting their USO tour of Europe and North Africa during World War II.

results.title: Every Other Inch a Lady cinema slide
results.brief_description: Glass Cinema lantern slide with black edging tape and internal black frame. This coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Every Other Inch a Lady’ featuring Lana Turner distributed by Metro Goldwyn Mayer Pictures Ltd. Several pieces of cream tape have been adhered to the top edge to cover cinema session details
